resources.string:
This app is brought to you by team SwaggySweng from EPFL
SwaggySweng is made by these awesome people

 Faton 'Fabrice' Ramadani
 Ismail 'Irène' Imani
 Raphael 'Roofie' ElKhoury
 Jad 'Jeremie' Khoury
 Lou 'Latifa' Richard
 Christophe 'Chimène' Gaudet-Blavignac
 Loic 'Lynda' Serafin

These are all hard-working students, dedicated to bring you an amazing app that can be great when it comes to showing-off.

#TeamSwaggySwengRPZT

SmartTabs is an application brought to you by SwaggySweng from EPFL, to give you a basic way to learn the guitar using ASCII tabs. Upgraded with a setting to slow Tab speed, and a flashing metronome in the upper right corner, we believe this application will help newcomers learn the guitar easier.\nThere is also an online editor for this app at http://178.62.199.28/ where you can upload your own tabs, and if you\'re a professional, create your own tab, and then play this tab in our application!\nPlease submit any bugs encountered to swaggy_sweng@gmail.com.

Play/Pause : Click on Screen
Metronome on upper right corner
Scroll through Tab: Swipe left and right 
Add to Favorite: Star Icon on Lower Right
Set Tab Speed: Arrows on bottom of the screen
Show Menu: Swipe from left to right on tab screen

Play/Pause : Click on Screen
Metronome on upper right corner
Scroll through Tab: Swipe left and right 
Add to Favorite: Star Icon on Lower Right
Set Tab Speed: Arrows on bottom of the screen
